desc: Welcome to the Hunter Lane Equestrian Center. We're a boarding and training facility at the base of Taylor Mountain in beautiful Sonoma Count, California

layout.text: Unfortunately, we are only able to allow haul in’s for lessons with our resident trainers. In order to prevent crowding, our arenas are groomed and maintained exclusively for resident boarders and trainers. No exceptions will be made.
Please reach out to David Lawson (319) 371-6663 for western lessons, Lori Fields (415) 497-8607‬ for english lessons, or Jenny Gaster (310) 272-6001 for beginners.
